price: En cambio, los moradores del Paraíso tendrán la mejor morada y el mejor lugar de descanso.
arabic: أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ يَوۡمَئِذٍ خَيۡرٞ مُّسۡتَقَرّٗا وَأَحۡسَنُ مَقِيلٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: aṣḥābu al-janati yawma-idhin khayrun mus'taqarran wa-aḥsanu maqīlan
